text: Julwania is a town in Rajpur tehsil of Barwani district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh. ==Geography== Julwania is located in the Narmada Valley on crossroads of AB Road, part of AH47 & MP SH 26, at . It has an average elevation of . Situated in the eastern area of Barwani district, Julwania lies from Rajpur & from Barwani. ==References== ==External links== * Barwani District Category:Barwani district Category:Cities and towns in Barwani district
title: Julwania
